short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rustinator is a companion app for the game Rust. It allows you to view your server's information, players, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows Rustinator to obtain your Rust+ companion service token, enabling it to send and receive team chat messages.

How to use?

Click on the extension icon to be redirected to the Rust+ login page, and log in using your Steam account.
